DOC.brief_summary: IMPORTANCE Skin rejuvenation achieve effectively safely injection stabilize hyaluronic acid ( HA ) -based gel nonanimal origin ( NASHA ) injection use stamp-type electronic multineedle injector . OBJECTIVE To determine efficacy safety NASHA use stamp-type electronic multineedle injector , change skin physiology occur earlier previous trial . DESIGN , SETTING , AND PARTICIPANTS Twenty-five patient recruit single-center , evaluator-blinded , prospective , balance ( 1:1 ) , split-face randomized clinical trial.One dermatologist blind treatment side evaluate skin hydration , melanin content , erythema , elasticity cheek use corneometer , mexameter , reviscometer , respectively , follow-up visit ( 0 , 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 week postinjection ) . The subject two independent investigator assess clinical improvement use Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale ( GAIS ) every visit . Twenty-four participant complete study , participant withdraw due adverse effect . INTERVENTIONS Each participant submit single treatment NASHA injection one side low cheek . The cheek side treatment apply choose randomly .
DOC.brief_title: Changing Skin Physiology After Microdroplet Placement Stabilized Hyaluronic Acid Aging Faces
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty-five patient recruit single-center , evaluator-blinded , prospective , balance ( 1:1 ) , split-face randomized clinical trial . Twenty-four participant complete study , participant withdraw due adverse effect . Each participant submit single treatment NASHA injection one side low cheek . One dermatologist blind treatment side evaluate skin hydration , melanin content , erythema , elasticity cheek use corneometer , mexameter , reviscometer , respectively , follow-up visit ( 0 , 1 , 2 , 4 , 8 , 12 week postinjection ) . The subject two independent investigator assess clinical improvement use Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale ( GAIS ) every visit . Adverse event self-reported patient complete questionnaire .
DOC.criteria: Healthy people older 25 year know hypersensitivity HA , active skin disease , autoimmune disorder , significant renal , hepatic , medical disease
